name: PerkMeUp
0:
”Alexa, tell Perk Me Up I need a compliment”
”Alexa, ask Perk Me Up to cheer me up”
”Alexa, tell Perk Me Up I am feeling down”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: perk me up
des: Perk Me Up will lift your spirits when you are feeling down or just need a compliment. Perk Me Up will respond with a compliment that will make you feel good about yourself and get you back on your feet with a smile.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
